Package com.cmput301fa16t5.legendary_telegram

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayObserver
    Updates Rider/Driver ArrayLists as well as active ArrayAdapters Purpose of this class is to hold the Requests of Rider and Driver and sync them with the views in the activities while biting ElasticSearch's heel and asking "any new stuff" This class implements...
    CentralController
    Lone Singleton for the App; Mediator between activities, data, server and disk.
    ContactScreenActivity
    Contact Screen -- Accept/Commit to Requests/Drivers, Phone/Email Contact info, see Route on Map.
    ContactScreenController
    Contact Screen Controller - Retrieves data for the activity and does logical computations.
    ContextFactory
    Created and given Context at the start of the app so that Context isn't being dragged around constantly.
    Driver
    Accepts and Commits Requests.
    ElasticSearchController
    Major Module designated to implement Wifi connectivity.
    ElasticSearchController.AddRequestsTask
    Task for adding requests Usage: ElasticSearchController.AddRequestsTask addRequestsTask = new ElasticSearchController.AddRequestsTask(); addRequestsTask.execute(newRequest);
    ElasticSearchController.DeleteRequestsTask
    Task for deleting requests Usage: ElasticSearchController.DeleteRequestsTask deleteRequestsTask = new ElasticSearchController.DeleteRequestsTask(); addRequestsTask.execute(deadRequest);
    ElasticSearchController.GetRequests
    Task for getting requests Usage: ElasticSearchController.GetRequestsTask getRequestsTask = new ElasticSearchController.GetRequestsTask(); requestList = addRequestsTask.execute(queryType, stringsToLookFor).get();
    ElasticSearchController.UpdateRequestsTask
    Task for updating requests Usage: ElasticSearchController.updateRequestsTask updateRequestsTask = new ElasticSearchController.UpdateRequestsTask(); addRequestsTask.execute(updatedRequest);
    ElasticSearchQueries
    A number of Queries for ElasticSearch.
    FilterActivity
    Filter Activity for when a Driver picks requests by keyword/cost.
    FilterController
    Filter Controller, processes inputs to Filter Activity.
    GsonController
    Gson controller class.
    IdentificationCard
    Small object that simply holds Username, Phone, Email, Vehicle fields.
    LogInActivity
    Activity (View) class for Log In Screen.
    LogInController
    Controller for Log In Screen Activity Very simple, given the activity.
    MainRequestActivity
    After a user logs in, they see this screen.
    MainRequestController
    Corresponds to MainRequestActivity Processes inputs by setting current requests if ArrayAdapter is clicked or setting the User as a Rider or Driver depending on what button is clicked.
    MapController
    MapController class is the controller of the map.
    MapData
    Data class created to hold the start and end location data so it can be passed more easily between the map and any activities it might call.
    MapsActivity
    MapsActivity class is the view of the map.
    Request
    Request class - Major "Model" class.
    RequestStatusActivity
    Clicking on a Request in MainRequestActivity should lead to this (if Rider) For a Rider this would be more detailed information like the number of Drivers have offered to fulfill that request.
    RequestStatusController
    Controller for the Request Status screen.
    Rider
    Rider class.
    RiderDriverParent
    Parent class or Rider and Driver, containing common fields and accessors/modifiers for them.
    User
    User class.
    UserProfileActivity
    Activity for making new Users or modifying old ones.
    UserProfileController
    User Profile Controller, checks if entered information is any good.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RequestEnum
    Enum describing the states of Request Request is initially made set to openRequest.
    UserProfileEnum
    This is just an Enum used for parsing the information in the User Profile Activity/Controller set.
